<h3>Details</h3>
<p align='justify'>
As part of the Climate Change Initiative (CCI) promoted by ESA, this is the first, mid-resolution dataset of its kind to cover nearly three decades. As a consequence, it offers an important basis for for continuous change detection and monitoring. While initially produced as an Essential Climate Variable (ECV) and a basis for climate modeling, it has been used in other applications (e.g. ecology, land use science) depicting its wide applicability. You can explore this dataset through a decidated viewer <a href="https://maps.elie.ucl.ac.be/CCI/viewer/index.php">a dedicated viewer</a>.
</p>
